document.full_text: kazakhstan's veteran leader nursultan nazarbayev celebrated his landslide re-election on monday but europe's main monitoring mission said the vote was marred by irregularities and pressed for democratic reforms.
document.title: kazakh hails win, osce urges more reform
lines_and_colors: kazakhstan's veteran leader nursultan nazarbayev celebrated his landslide re-election on monday but europe's main monitoring mission said the vote was marred by irregularities and pressed for democratic reforms.
